unit_test.hpp File Reference

This file is a facade header file for the TEST-DOG Unit Testing Framework. Including it provides access to the TEST-DOG macros and the testdog::runner class. More...

Detailed Description

This file is a facade header file for the TEST-DOG Unit Testing Framework. Including it provides access to the TEST-DOG macros and the testdog::runner class.
